mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, displayStatus = 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article WHERE nickname LIKE '%#{searchKeyword}%'
SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE displayStatus = 1 ORDER BY A.id DESC
SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
